description: This file defines a ChangeNotifier-based provider class named NotesProvider that manages a list of notes. It interacts with a notes repository to perform CRUD operations and listens to updates via a stream.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider that exposes a list of notes and allows CRUD operations on them.

methods.name: NotesProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializes the provider with an optional repository and sets up a stream subscription to updates.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cancels the stream subscription when the provider is disposed.
